author: TMZ Staff
title: Taylor Swift, Bruno Mars Super Bowl Party Is a Meat Lover's Dream (PHOTO GALLERY)
text:
Taylor Swift, Bruno Mars Super Bowl Party Is a Meat Lovers Dream Taylor Swift, Bruno Mars Our Super Bowl Party Is A Meat Lover's Dream 2/1/2017 2:03 PM PST EXCLUSIVE 
A Super Bowl pregame party in Houston is about to put all other BBQs to shame by offering up more than 2000 lbs of beef in the lead-up to Sunday's big game ... TMZ has learned. 
STK is catering the DIRECTV & PEPSI 3 day concert series -- an annual hotspot for celebs at the game -- this weekend where Taylor Swift , Bruno Mars , The Chainsmokers , Sam Hunt and Snoop Dogg will all perform. 
The talent ain't the only thing stacked -- check out this menu: 
- 1100 lbs of ribeye - chili spiced chicken confit with roasted corn- chili rubbed lamb chops - pork belly buns with mango slaw- mini burgers with caramelized onions and cheddar- tuna tartare with avocado, jalapeno and soy honey emulsion - 720 lbs of potatoes- a 6 hour cooked risotto 
And now, you can go cry in the pitiful 7 layer dip you were gonna serve at your Super Bowl party.
